name: User List for Ultimate Member
author: SuitePlugins

sections.description:
Experience the ability to list user suggestions for your Ultimate Member community. If you are using the Ultimate Member plugins Followers or Friends then the plugin will only suggest users that you are not following or who you are not friends with. This way the plugin will always suggest someone new.

In an upcoming update the plugin will work with the Ultimate Member Meet Me plugin to suggest users that match profile criteria that the current user is looking for.

Features

  • AJAX user suggestions – View other suggestions by simply clicking show more.
  • Language Localization ready
  • Shortcode and Widget available

Feature suggestions are welcomed and appreciated.

How to use it

Once installed and activated, you can add a shortcode to a page, page builder or text widget or you can use the User Suggestions Widget

User Suggestions shortcode
* Add the shortcode [um_user_suggestions] to your page or widget.
* Add the the shortcode attribute count to adjust the number of suggestions per load for e.g [um_user_suggestions count=”2″]
* Add the the shortcode attribute orderby to order the suggestions alphabetically or randomly for e.g [um_user_suggestions orderby=”random”]. Sorted Alphabetically by default.
* Add the the shortcode attribute more_text to change the text in the link that will show other suggestions e.g [um_user_suggestions more_text=”Click to show more”]

User Suggestions widget
* Go to Appearance > Widgets
* Drag or place the widget UM Users List into a sidebar
* Set the title and amount to show
* Save and preview

Other Ultimate Member Plugins

SuitePlugins is on the verge of creating some great addons for Ultimate Member. Here are a few that you may want to check out

  • Ultimate Member Advanced Search – Create a super fast advanced search for Ultimate Member.
  • Gallery – Most Popular An easy drag and drop gallery for Ultimate Members.
  • Events
  • Classifieds – Easy to use market place plugin for Ultimate Member
  • Docs – Let users upload files that can be seen publicly or privately
  • Stories – Allow users to have a journal or mini-blog from their profile.
  • Visitors – Visitors allow users to see others that have visited their profile
  • Relationships – Allow users to select family members and display them on their profile
  • Gallery Lite – An easy drag and drop gallery for Ultimate Members.

Ultimate Member Theme

  • SocialTribe – WordPress Theme built to Support Ultimate Member
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/um-users-list directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.faq:
What plugins do I need?

This plugin requires Ultimate Member

Where can I place the translation file?

The files can be placed in wp-content/languages/plugins/ with the file name um-users-list-en_US.mo.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • Plugin released into the wild

1.0.1

  • Updated readme with instructions
  • Updated language file

1.0.1.1

  • Fixed: Profile URL not linked correctly

1.0.1.2

New
* New shortcode attribute for random users orderby=”random”
* New shortcode attribute for custom Show more text more_text=”Click to display more”

Improvements
* Tested Ultimate Member 2.0.55 and WordPress 5.2.2 compatibility
* Improved codebase

1.0.1.4

  • Tested WordPress 5.8.2 and Ultimate Member 2.2.5 compatibility

short_description: A plugin for Ultimate member that allows users to display user suggestions in a simple widget.
